name: Prometheus (fs0000)
description:
A fun, small yet challenging game developed by:

Flávio Santos

Leandro Brás

Sara Gama

@Lusófona University, 2018

----------------------------------------------------------------

Objective

Jump from platforms, attach yourself to columns at defeat greek aliens in order to reach the portal at the end!

----------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

A / Left Arrow - Move Left

D / Right Arrow - Move Right

Space Bar - Jump (Hold to jump higher)

W - Shoot small fire balls

E - Shoot big fire ball (Hold for 2 seconds)

Q - Aim (Use Q + Up Arrow + W to shoot upwards)
